sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <record_update table="v_plugin"> <v_plugin action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <active>active</active> <available_version>1.0.0</available_version> <definition><![CDATA[<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?> <plugin id="com.glide.source_control" name="Metadata Source Control" version="1.0.0" provider_name="ServiceNow" state="published" type="application" startup="com.glide.digitalsignature.DigitalSignaturePluginStartup" licensable="true" namespace="sn_vcs"> <description>Source control integration applies and commits changes in an external repository</description>
<requires> <import plugin="com.glide.system_update_set"/> </requires>
<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="SourceControlErrorInfoFinder" class="com.glide.sourcecontrol.SourceControlErrorInfoFinder"/>
<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="Branches" class="com.glide.sourcecontrol.api.Branches"/> <extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="CommitDetails" class="com.glide.sourcecontrol.api.CommitDetails"/> <extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="Commits" class="com.glide.sourcecontrol.api.Commits"/> <extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="CommitStashPreview" class="com.glide.sourcecontrol.api.CommitStashPreview"/> <extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="CreateBranch" class="com.glide.sourcecontrol.api.CreateBranch"/> <extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="CreateTag" class="com.glide.sourcecontrol.api.CreateTag"/> <extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="GenerateStashPreview" class="com.glide.sourcecontrol.api.GenerateStashPreview"/> <extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="OutgoingChanges" class="com.glide.sourcecontrol.api.OutgoingChanges"/> <extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="RefreshRepository" class="com.glide.sourcecontrol.api.RefreshRepository"/> <extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="Repositories" class="com.glide.sourcecontrol.api.Repositories"/> <extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="RepositoryWorkers" class="com.glide.sourcecontrol.api.RepositoryWorkers"/> <extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="SourceControl" class="com.glide.sourcecontrol.api.SourceControl"/> <extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="Stashes" class="com.glide.sourcecontrol.api.Stashes"/> <extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="Tags" class="com.glide.sourcecontrol.api.Tags"/> <extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="TestConnection" class="com.glide.sourcecontrol.api.TestConnection"/> <extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="Updates" class="com.glide.sourcecontrol.api.Updates"/>
<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="AppSourceControl" class="com.glide.sourcecontrol.appapi.AppSourceControl"/> <extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="CreateBranchForApp" class="com.glide.sourcecontrol.appapi.CreateBranchForApp"/> <extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="ExportApplication" class="com.glide.sourcecontrol.appapi.ExportApplication"/> <extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="ImportApplication" class="com.glide.sourcecontrol.appapi.ImportApplication"/> <extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="RegisterRepository" class="com.glide.sourcecontrol.appapi.RegisterRepository"/> <extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="SwitchToBranch" class="com.glide.sourcecontrol.appapi.SwitchToBranch"/> </plugin> ]]></definition> <description>Source control integration applies and commits changes in an external repository</description> <has_demo_data>false</has_demo_data> <help/> <id>com.glide.source_control</id> <licensable>true</licensable> <name>Metadata Source Control</name> <path>plugin://com.glide.source_control/</path> <provider>ServiceNow</provider> <requires>com.glide.system_update_set</requires> <scope>global</scope> <state>published</state> <supports_rollback>false</supports_rollback> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2017-12-05 06:05:21</sys_created_on> <sys_id>com.glide.source_control</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2017-12-05 06:05:21</sys_updated_on> <trackable>true</trackable> <type>application</type> <version>1.0.0</version> </v_plugin> </record_update>
